Name: sot-sheikheliaskeke
Author: Sheikh Elias Keketso Lelia
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa (IDM)

Translations.Text: Motlotlehi(oa Egepeta) o re: “Ke lorile ke bona likhomo tse nonneng tse supileng, li jeoa ke likhomo tse supileng tse otileng; le litsejana tse supileng tse talana tsa koro ekasitana le tse supileng tse bajooeng. Oho lona matona! Ntlhalosetseng toro ea ka, haeba le ka khona ho hlalosa litoro.”
Ba re: “Tlhakants’uts’u ea litoro! Rona ha re tsebe ho manolla le hona ho hlalosa litoro
Eaba monna e mong oa bobeli ebile e le oa ho lopolloa chankaneng, o hopola Josefa kamor’a nako, a re: “Ke tla u joetsa tlhaloso ea eona ha feela eba u ka nthoma ho ea e lata.”

Hoba a fihle ho Josefa chankaneng, a re: “Oho Josefa! Uena ea nang le ‘nete! A k’u re rarollele toro ea likhomo tse supileng tse nonneng, tse jeoang ke tse otileng tse supileng le litsejana tsa koro tse supileng tse talana le tse supileng tse bajuoeng, hore ke tle ke boele ho batho; battle ba tsebe
Josefa a re: “le tla lema ka lilemo tse supileng joaloka ka mehla, empa seo le tla beng le se kotutse le se tlohele se sa poloa, haese se senyenyane seo le tla seja
Joale kamor’a moo, ho tla tla lilemo tse supileng tsa tlala tse tla metsa tsohle tseo le tla beng le ile la li lokisa e sa le pele, haese se fokolang seo le ileng la ipokella sona
Kamor’a moo, ho tla latela selemo seo batho ba tla bale chai e ngata hoo ba tla beng ba tlhotle veine le mafura.”
